name: TankShooter
description:
My first game made with Godot! :)

Just aim with mouse and shoot. You have 3 lives, after 5 lasers are shot, tower is reloading. from at 400 score maximum spawn speed is achieved. I hope you enjoy the game!

Assets from : https://www.kenney.nl/assets

music:  https://www.kenney.nl/assets , https://freesound.org/people/Daleonfire/ , https://freesound.org/people/V-ktor/ , https://freesound.org/people/magnuswaker/ , https://pixabay.com/users/dstechnician-26430546/
